title: Abdaʽ mā kāna wa-aǧwad mā yastafīduhu aṭ-ṭullāb ʽilm al-bayān wa-'l-manṭiq wa-'t-tauḥīd wa-'l-ḥisāb
creator: Ḥusain Ibn-Šāmī al-Hatārī al-Madanī,
subject: Außereuropäische Handschriften
source: Ḥusain Ibn-Šāmī al-Hatārī al-Madanī,: Abdaʽ mā kāna wa-aǧwad mā yastafīduhu aṭ-ṭullāb ʽilm al-bayān wa-'l-manṭiq wa-'t-tauḥīd wa-'l-ḥisāb. Berlin
